entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
